::: Black Aracnia cursed as she looked at her shoulder. Mech fluid flowed 
from the wound. Quickstrike and Senesis were gone. :::

::: pheniox barged into the room ::: What happened? I heard an explosion!

::: Black Aracnia glanced at her ::: No, no. I just tried to kill 
Quickstrike. Senesis rescued him though.

::: Pheniox ::: Get that shoulder fixed. Hell Beast said he was on his way 
home.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: The last battle driod exploded as Set and Ra exchanged fire with Hell 
Beast, Megatron, Jackle, Gremlin, Transanulas, and Marine :::

::: Set ::: Damn it! We cant fight them, they out number us,....

::: Ra ::: Master...you under estimate me.

::: His hands glowed a cosmic blue, and he shot forth a blue blaze that 
englufed a nearby tree, sending it tumbling down and scattering the Predacons 
:::

::: Set laughed ::: Good...now we can pick them off...

::: Ra continued to level the forest :::

~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast ::: Keep firing, they will die here and now!

::: Jackle and Gremlin nodded. Marine stood behinde Hell Beast while 
Transanulas and Megatron were seperated :::

::: Hell Beast looked at the giant turtle bot agian ::: General?

::: Marine ::: Yes, and I wish only to serve you commander. 

::: Hell Beast ::: o....k

::: Marine ::: now, if Jackle and Gremlin work there way behinde Set and Ra, 
we can attack from all sides.

::: Hell Beast looks to the two Predacons ::: You heard him, do it!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron looks to the spider, and then to his broken leg ::: 

::: Transanulas gave his classic chuckle ::: Oh Megatron, you were always a 
fool.

::: Megatron ::: Shut up, scheming tarantula! I killed your original...and 
Ill kill you too!

::: Transanulas ::: I have better things to do.

::: He poked up and shot Set, sending him sprawling to the fern covered floor 
:::

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Ra saw Set fall, and then Gremlin and Jackle assulted him from behinde. 
He fell like a rag doll. Marine and Hell Beast rushed over to view the 
damage. Transanulas walked in front of the limping Megatron :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Ah! Set, you are a weak leader indeed.

::: Megatron ::: A wise tyrant would have stay-

::: Suddenly, they realized Ares was firing at them. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Damn, retreat. We will get them agian.

::: The small team retreated and arrived at the Base. Pheniox and Balck 
Aracnia were egar to greet them :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast, through the remaining CR chamber and now fully healed sat in 
his command chair :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Ah, truly this was a fateful week.

::: Transanulas, who was being watched closely ::: Yes, and I for one am glad 
it is done with! In a matter of time these new comers will be gone.

::: Megatron ::: Yes. But we will work together. For now, the Predacons are 
the lesser of two evils...

::: Hell Beast ::: No matter. We will win, the new comers and the Maximals 
will be no more. Pheniox, contact Zardus. I belive a meet between me, him, 
and Megatron is in order.

::: Megatron ::: And contact shredder. From what I hear, Quickstrike has gone 
quite mad....
